content: Carbide Wood Hole Saw Ultimate Carbide Wood Hole Saw for cutting wood and nail embedded wood (arbor sold separately) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile - cut holes in most everyday construction materials using the same hole saw. Knock-out holes for easier core removal. Premium quality Bi-Metal Construction. 1-15/16 cutting depth Applications Cutting holes for MEP installations in plasterboard, wood, plastic, steel and aluminum. Cutting holes for cable/pipe penetrations. Cutting holes in plasterboard for sprinkler heads. Cutting holes for power outlets and electrical fixtures. Hole Saws must be used with a compatible arbor and pilot bit. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Wood Working mode: Drilling Connection end: Hex shank, 7/16 in hexagonal Technical Data | Base material | Wood | Working mode | Drilling | Connection end | Hex shank, 7/16 in hexagonal ### ITEMS- 3955844 - 1-3/4” X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955843 - 1-3/8 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLE SAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955846 - 2-1/4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955845 - 2-1/8 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955848 - 2-3/4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955847 - 2-9/16 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955849 - 3 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLE SAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955850 - 3-5/8 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955851 - 4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLE SAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955852 - 4-1/4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955853 - 4-5/8 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955854 - 5-1/4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3955855 - 6-1/4 X 2 CARBIDE TIPPED HOLESAW - Package Size 1 pc - 3957959 - 1/4 x 3-1/2 HSS PILOT BITS - Package Size 10
